'''Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook.

The recipe for The Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds can be obtained from the {{Quest|Receiver of Friends From Afar: Part II}}.

Depending on the quality, The Trembling Strings and Rushing Reeds increases all party members' CRIT Rate by '''10'''/'''15'''/'''20'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
